trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed removal of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma remoção proposta de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the index of the activity being removed when you remove the activity using the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Indica o índice da atividade que está sendo removido quando você remover a atividade usando as alterações de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which the activity was removed.
trans-unit.target: Atividade de raiz do qual a atividade foi removida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância do original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que está sendo removido.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.
trans-unit.target: A instância do original <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que está sendo removido.

trans-unit.source: Gets index of the removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> collection of the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do removido <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>coleção do pai <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> being removed.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que está sendo removido.
